attributes.action: REVERSE DECISION ON TAXATION ON ELECTRIC SCCOTERS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
COULD THE PRIME MINISTER ASK THE EU TO REVERSE ITS DECISION ON MAKING ENGLAND PUT A BUYING TAX ON SCOOTERS.
THESE ARE ESENTIAL PIECES OF WALKING EQUIPEMENT FOR THE DISABLED, TO ENABLE THEM GET OUT OF THE HOUSE, DO THEIR OWN SHOPPING, GO TO THE LIBRARY ON THEIR OWN, AND EVEN WALKING THE DOG.
THESE SCOOTERS ARE NOT A SPORTS THING, NOT AN ITEM OF AFFLUENCE, NOR TO OWN ONE IS STREET CREED. THEY ARE NEEDED BY THE UNFORTUNATE PEOPLE WHO HAVE TO USE THEM.

rejection.details: Please reduce your use of capital letters.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
